column5: 1. Alexander Keiths Pale Ale 2. Sleeman Silver Creek Lager3. Anything Cold
Ice Cold PILSNER!!!
Sleeman's Cream Ale (red label)Creemore Springs Lager (green bottle)Muskoka Pale Ale (yellow and black label)

my favorite is what ever my buddies are drinking. i wait for thier beer labels to fall off in the cooler so that cant tell I'm drinking thier beer. last year i bought 1 case of labby light but drank over 3 cases durring the week.

Old Vienna SPLITS. Baby bottles, sans nipples. Sweet as nectar. Now scarce as warming pans in the West Indies. Used to hump a case or two (roped and hog-tied carry-on) home to Oregon every year, but 9/11 put a stop to that.
That would have to be Red Stripe.... oh #####, thats Jamaican...Can you repeat the question......burp
Molson Golden
Wildcat Strong -- Forte!!!!

In my opinion, there really isn't a bad Canadian beer. The best beer is the nice cold one you have at the end of great day of fishing with your friends. There's nothing better than sitting outside listening to the loons calling to each other and swapping "lies" at the end of the day. If I have to choose...give me a Blue!

OK...been thinking about this for a few days, and I believe I like "Boh" the best.:)

My favorite beers are the ones I get every year for catching the biggest fish of each spieces. Its a game we play each day. 2 beers from each guy in the boat for the largest Walleye, Northern, Smallie and perch. A six pack from each guy on Wednesday for the largest of the week.
Molson Tripple X (XXX) all the way!
ALL CANADIAN BEER IS GOOD FROM A TO Z . TASTE BETTER THAN THAT AMERICIAN BUCK P**S WE ARE FORDED TO DRINK ALL THE TIME.
Kokanee for me!
Come on guys... if your gonna drink canadian beer ... drink Molsons "Canadian"!!TJhttp://www.ontariofishing.net

Since it is pretty boring today I thought I would start a discussion that everyone probably has an opinion on. What is your favorite Canadian beer when in the great White North?I prefer Crystal but let me hear what you enjoy.I just love ejoying a cold one while on the lake taking in mother nature and catching several 'eyes for supper. PS ,, ,I dont need anybody telling me the evils of drinking on the water and the legality behing it,,,
Kokanee... I can think of lots of good places to drink it...SelkirkPine FallsWinnipegChilliwackthe list goes on and on!ToddYup, got her... feel that head shake!
Blue!
LaBatt's Blue!! BUT, every brand I've tried is great!

Molson Export Ale
BLUE
Nothing better than an ice cold Blue. Except when Bigfish buys the beer cause he lost the big fish contest to yours truly!!Ivy

IvyI figured it wouldn't take you long to respond to this thread. The only reason you won the biggest fish contest is I was to busy workin on the Blue. We all have our priorities. How big was that Dogfish?Bigfish

Bigfish,Green is not your color.Put away that petty jealousy and lets just try to get along.If not for me, how about for old Herm Johnson. He is the old boy that taught us how to fish.,remember or did you forget him already.Remember what old Herm used to say; " Boys, it's not how many fish you catch.........it's uh.....it's uh...oh never mind, hand me another beer. Ivy
